amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to sunset the provision of Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that increases payments to hospitals in a few States by reducing payments to the majority of States through the Medicare hospital wage index.

vote.text: Amendment SA 409 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 31. Record Vote Number: 57.

action.text: Amendment SA 409 proposed by Senator Coburn.
